provider.name: Monster API
provider.description: Monster API allows developers and enterprises to build LLM-powered applications.

models.title: Chat Completions
models.description: Portkey supports all OpenAI compliant chat completions models avaialble on Monster API

notSupported.promptPlayground: Prompt playground is not supported for Monster API models

models.note: Portkey does not support image generation models for Monster API
Portkey does not support speech models for Monster API
Portkey does not support compare models for Monster API

integrationViaVirtualKey.description: Integrate Monster API using Portkey's virtual key system

inline.text: Get your API key from Monster API and add it to Portkey to create a virtual key.
inline.description: You can get your Monster API key from the Monster API website [here](https://monsterapi.ai/login).

portkeyPythonSDK.description: Initialize Portkey with the virtual key in Python
portkeyPythonSDK.codeExample: sample python SDK code for google/gemma-2-9b-it chat completions call on Monster API using virtual key

portkeyNodeSDK.description: Initialize Portkey with the virtual key in Node.js
portkeyNodeSDK.codeExample: sample node.js SDK code for google/gemma-2-9b-it chat completions call on Monster API using virtual key
